name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-2-Wa: Chuukagai no Ougonkyou
name_original: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-2-Wa: Chuukagai no Ougonkyou
description:
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-2-Wa: Chuukagai no Ougonkyou is an action game. It came out on 08-07-2011.
Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 1.5 Dai-2-Wa: Chuukagai no Ougonkyou is available on PSP.
